alert.note: Alert for Juneau; Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Juneau and southeastern Monroe Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elroy, or 11 miles west of Mauston, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Lisbon around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mill Bluff State Park, Camp Douglas, Kendall, Clifton, Hustler, Oakdale, Volk Field, Johnson Hill, Glendale and Mullin Ridge. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 48 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
